ValidationRule.description: If the partner on Opportunity has the partner level as National , Distributor is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( Distributor_Override__c), Terr_Theater__c = 'AMERICAS', NOT( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY ), OR(ISPICKVAL(Reseller__r.Partner_Level__c, 'National'), ISPICKVAL(Reseller__r.Partner_Level__c, 'Premier National')), ISBLANK( Distributor__c ), AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Not Contacted') ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Accepted') ) ), NOT(ISNEW()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Partner/Reseller is a National or Premier National account, please add a Distributor Account and Contact to this Opportunity.
